articles.title: Justin Bieber and Shawn Mendes gave us duel heartthrob AMA opening
articles.description: Oh Canada, two of your biggest stars opened the American Music Awards Sunday night.

articles.author: Jeff Zeleny and Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Secretary of state expected to be among the first positions Biden fills
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden is poised to announce his first Cabinet nominations on Tuesday, officials said, with secretary of state among the first positions he intends to reveal as he moves forward to form his new government.

articles.author: Kristen Rogers, CNN
articles.title: Vegans may be at higher risk for bone fractures, study finds
articles.description: Vegans, including those who ate enough calcium and protein, had greater risk of bone fractures, a new study has found. If you want to eat a vegan diet or meat-free diet, here's what you should know and how to do it well.

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Wisconsin Republican congressman says he has Covid-19
articles.description: GOP Rep. Bryan Steil of Wisconsin announced Sunday evening that he has tested positive for coronavirus and will go into isolation, according to a statement on his Twitter account.
articles.content:

articles.author: Analysis by Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: The election is still not over
articles.description: President Donald Trump's struggle to deny the results of the election is now up against an existential threat: a rapid succession of states due to certify their election results before the critical date of December 8.

articles.author: Susannah Cullinane
articles.title: Bob Dylan lyrics, letters sell for nearly half a million dollars
articles.description: A collection of Bob Dylan memorabilia including letters, unpublished lyrics and handwritten lyrics to "Blowin' in the wind" have sold for nearly half a million dollars, auctioneers say.

articles.title: See who is nominated for an AMA
articles.description: The American Music Awards will be presented Sunday. See below for the complete list of nominees and check back for winners throughout the night.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: From Denny's to Cracker Barrel, here are options for your pandemic Thanksgiving meal
articles.description: Since traveling is not advised for Thanksgiving this year, it leaves those staying home with a meal to prepare -- but several restaurants and stores are offering to help with full Thanksgiving dinners to-go.

articles.author: Jake Tapper and Annie Grayer, CNN
articles.title: Key GOP Michigan canvassing board member expected to vote against certifying results
articles.description: A key Republican on the Michigan canvassing board is expected to vote against certifying the state's election results on Monday, a potential boon for the Trump campaign's conspiracy theory-fueled effort to delay the finalization of results.

articles.author: Marika Gerken, CNN
articles.title: Looking for a job? This university shared its database with thousands of remote job openings
articles.description: California State University, East Bay published a public database of remote job vacancies across the country to help people struggling to find employment due to the pandemic.

articles.title: Samantha Vinograd: Trump trying to kneecap incoming Biden administration
articles.description: CNN national security analyst Samantha Vinograd explains why, despite President-elect Joe Biden's experience and seasoned support staff, the incoming administration might find itself playing catch-up on January 20.

articles.author: Ben Morse, CNN
articles.title: Daniil Medvedev battles from behind to win ATP Finals with victory over Dominic Thiem
articles.description: Daniil Medvedev claimed his second tournament victory in a row, as he won the ATP Finals with a three-set victory over Dominic Thiem on Sunday.

articles.title: Covid-19 risk looms over families torn on holiday travel
articles.description: Traditionally the Thanksgiving holiday is heavily traveled, but climbing coronavirus case numbers have many rethinking their plans. CNN's Natasha Chen reports the decision hasn't come easily for all.

articles.author: Dakin Andone and Melissa Alonso, CNN
articles.title: Tennessee's Down syndrome abortion ban can be enforced, appeals court rules
articles.description: Part of a Tennessee law banning abortions based on a prenatal diagnosis of Down syndrome or a fetus' race or sex, can take effect, a federal appeals court ruled Friday.

articles.author: Schams Elwazer
articles.title: Ethiopian PM issues 72-hour deadline for Tigrayan forces to surrender
articles.description: After weeks of deadly conflict in Ethiopia's northern Tigray region, Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed has given Tigrayan forces a 72-hour deadline to surrender.

articles.title: Vaccine czar explains 2 important points on vaccine safety
articles.description: Operation Warp Speed chief scientific adviser Moncef Slaoui discusses the safety and development of the Pfizer vaccine that Slaoui says could be available as early as mid-December.
